attributes.action: Make a loop hole in the law enabling Schools and colleges to obtain materials such as animal body parts to be bought from Butchers etc for educational purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently the supply of things such as animal eyes, lungs etc, from butchers and slaughter houses has been made difficult due to waste laws brought in by the government. Since this has happened it has become impossible to get hold of these items for dissection or demonstration in the educational environment. 
I therefore propose the law should be changed regarding Educational environments from schools to Colleges and University's to buy or be given these items freely as part of the education environment. As these Items are now not available it is having a large effect on the education of students. A hands on practical has more educational value than a "Text book" education.
